revised_title: A New Gregarine Species: Steinina rotundata, Found in Bird-Fleas of the Genus Ceratophyllus
tldr: The authors discover a new species of gregarine, Steinina rotundata, in the mid-gut of bird-fleas belonging to the genus Ceratophyllus. They describe the life cycle and morphology of the parasite, as well as its differences from other known gregarine species.
